# Photos Library Entitlement

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the app has read-write access to the user’s Photos library.

## Discussion

To add this entitlement to your app, first enable the Hardened Runtime capability in Xcode. Then, under Resource Access, select Photos Library.

## Personal information

- **Address book entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to contacts in the user’s address book.
- **Location entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may access location information from Location Services.
- **Calendars entitlement**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the app may have read-write access to the user’s calendar.
